title: Stanford Court Amenities You’ll Love
meta_description: When guests first discover our hotel, they are so surprised at all of the amenities we offer. What can we say?
short_description: When guests first discover our hotel, they are so surprised at all of the amenities we offer.
long_description:
When guests first discover our hotel, they are so surprised at all of the amenities we offer. What can we say? We like to treat our guests well and make sure they have everything they need for a memorable stay.

Tech at your fingertips

Our lobby and business center come equipped with seven MacBooks, iPads and iPad minis all running on our high-speed WiFi. Ideal for boarding passes and tickets, our wireless printing service can be accessed by the community computers and our guests’ personal devices. One of our newest San Francisco hotel amenities is an on-site electric vehicle charging station.  In our Fitness Center we have Kinima Fit, a responsive AI personal training system that is motion-activated.

New Albion and Blix Bikes 

We have partnered with Andy, our local bike expert, to commission him to build 18 custom bikes for guests to use. Andy sourced New Albion bike frames made here in San Francisco. We also have electric bikes from Blix Bikes, based out of Santa Cruz. There is something for everyone who wants to get out and explore San Francisco on two wheels.

Record Player

We’re all about that old meets new in at our hotel, so of course we have to offer guests the opportunity to get lost in the music. We’ve got a record player with your name on it and a wall full of the best records. Simply sit back and jam out.

On-demand espresso

There is some pretty amazing coffee in our wonderful city, but when you’re on the go before a meeting or day of sightseeing it can be hard to get that artisanal coffee out. In our lobby we offer on-demand espresso drinks. Simply push a few buttons and you will get a mocha, latte, or cappuccino in under a minute. Coffee not your deal? We’ve got freshly squeezed orange juice for you.

We’d love for you to come experience all of these great offerings today. Check out our Specials pages here.
